We Love Servers Where Quality Meets Affordability!
HD Special!​

**NEW DALLAS VPS SERVERS JUST ADDED**

WeLoveServers VPS hosting allows you to leverage the power of a dedicated server at a fraction of the cost. Our underlying platform is powered by OpenVZ for top notch reliability and performance. We utilize Intel Xeon E3 processors with hardware RAID10, we don't cut corners when it comes to hardware. That's why you'll find that we use enterprise class server hardware only, we never have and never will use desktop-grade hardware!

Specifications of our VPS's:
  • Hosted on Intel Xeon Quad-Core E31240v2 processors with hardware RAID10 to ensure redundancy and high performance. All backed with robust infrastructure and a premium multi-homed network.
  • OpenVZ-based for minimal virtualization overhead
  • Instant VPS Setup (i.e. start using your VPS right away!)
  • 99.9% Uptime
  • Full Root Access (full control over your VPS!)
  • Additional IPv4 Addresses Available
  • 5 x FREE IPv6 Addresses
  • Choice of Linux OS: CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu, more upon request.
  • Access to VPS CP to manage your VPS (ex: starting, stopping, rebooting server without needing to email support)
Network Information
We Love Servers offers 4 hosting locations for the above promotions. You may select the location you would like your VPS to be set up in during the ordering process.
  • Los Angeles, California – 192.210.195.2
  • Dallas, Texas – 192.227.137.2
  • Buffalo, New York – 192.227.135.130
  • Orlando, FL - 72.29.70.131
